"Hilda":
"Your final task is to defeat a Rockbear.
Use everything you've learned to take it down."

"Read the enemy's movements and attack its weak point.
After it uses a big attack, the enemy will be open for a short time.
Try to hit it during those moments."
"/ci1 2 W-we have to fight something that big? Now?!"
"/ci1 2 Partner! You take the front line! I'll back you up!"
